ComicInfo.Summary:
Mad Dog Kazan plots to squeeze Judge Dredd and his forces between his Northern troops and the Strato-V dropped forces to Dredd's South.
Surrounded by the Nort's primitive GI's when he wakes, Rogue and Helm break free and make a run for it.
